lessons.title: 2 - Advice for you
lessons.content:
Here you can download Houdini 19

  1. Houdini is not easy to learn and it can be frustrating in the beginning, but its very very powerful and robust. After you learn it, you will be able to create Magics!

  2. You must focus while you watch my videos, don't talk or do other things while you watch the lectures, its not like other 3D applications.

  3. You need to do hard work to learn it.

  4. Ask me any question you want and I am going to help you.

If you found out anything wrong with any lecture like (wrong lectures order, missing files...), please let me know immediately by sending me a message.


Good Luck :)

lessons.title: 4 - Shortcuts for navigating in the viewport
lessons.filename: 4 - Shortcuts for navigating in the viewport.html
lessons.content:
This is an image that shows you shortcuts for the Camera.

  1. Alt + left mouse = Tumble

  2. Alt + right mouse = Zoom

  3. Alt + middle mouse = track

  4. Space + G or Space +H to frame the camera

  5. Space + B to split the viewport

lessons.title: 177 - How to add a different viscosity for each Emitter in Houdini 175
lessons.filename: 177 - How to add a different viscosity for each Emitter in Houdini 175.html
lessons.content:
In Houdini 17.5 they changed the Flip source a little bit.

As you see from the screenshot I created and attribute create node to add a different viscosity for each emitter.

So what's happening here is that viscosity attribute will be sent to flip solver and the flip solver will understand that you want a different viscosity for each emitter.
